Mikhail Mikhajlovich Derzhavin(; 15 June 1936 – 10 January 2018) was a Soviet and Russian actor. He was born in Moscow. He was known for his roles in "They Were the First" (1956), "Three Men in a Boat" (1979), "Investigation Held by ZnaToKi" (1980), "Winter Evening in Gagra" (1985) and in "Old Hags" (2000) as Secretary of the Communist ideology.
Derzhavin died of a long-illness in Moscow on 10 January 2018 at the age of 81.
